issue.title: [Ruby] Add API to read/write by partitions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14604](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14604). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should add convenient API for `Arrow::Table#save`/`Arrow::Table.load to allow read or write multiple files at once`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14604?focusedCommentId=17603191) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned per [project policy](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/dev/developers/bug_reports.html#issue-assignment). Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
